hero.title: Empowering Civil Society Through Collaboration & Connectivity
hero.subtitle: Collaboration & Connectivity
hero.description: Our platform is designed to connect Civil Society Organisations (CSOs), donors, and stakeholders across Nigeria, Benin, and The Gambia ‚Äî enabling meaningful partnerships and shared impact.

mission.title: Bridging Gaps and Connecting Civil Society
mission.subtitle: for Greater Impact Across West Africa
mission.description: We built this platform to empower Civil Society Organisations by fostering collaboration, resource sharing, and cross-border partnerships across Nigeria, Benin, and The Gambia.

missionValue.missionText: To strengthen the civil society ecosystem by providing a platform where organisations can connect, share resources, and collaborate for greater social impact.
missionValue.valueText: A unified and empowered civil society across West Africa, working together to build resilient, inclusive, and sustainable communities.

impact.title: Driving Change Across Nigeria, Benin, and The The Gambia

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about our CSO collaboration platform and how it can help your organization connect and grow.

whatIsPlatform.question: What is the CSO Network for West Africa?
whatIsPlatform.answer: The CSO Network for West Africa is a digital platform designed to connect Civil Society Organisations (CSOs) across Nigeria, Benin, and The Gambia. Our platform enables organizations to discover partners, share resources, collaborate on projects, and access funding opportunities while building meaningful cross-border partnerships.

whoCanJoin.question: Who can join the platform?
whoCanJoin.answer: Our platform is open to Civil Society Organisations, NGOs, community-based organizations, donors, media personnel, policy makers, and anyone interested in supporting civil society work in West Africa. We have different user roles with appropriate access levels for each type of user.

howToRegister.question: How do I register my organization?
howToRegister.answer: To register your organization, click on 'Join as Organization' and complete our 5-step registration process: Basic Information, Contact Information, Organizational Details, Legal & Financial information, and Media & Documents. Once submitted, our team will review and approve your application.

whatFeatures.question: What features does the platform offer?
whatFeatures.answer: Our platform offers organization discovery and networking, resource library access, project showcase and collaboration, community forum discussions, funding opportunity listings, event and webinar hosting, online course access, blog and news sharing, and multi-language support in English, French, and Spanish.

isFree.question: Is the platform free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, the basic features of our platform are free for all registered Civil Society Organisations. This includes organization profile creation, resource sharing, forum participation, and access to funding opportunities. Some premium features may be introduced in the future.

howToPartner.question: How can I find and connect with other organizations?
howToPartner.answer: You can discover organizations using our advanced search and filter system by country (Nigeria, Benin, The Gambia), thematic areas, regions, and project types. Once you find relevant organizations, you can view their profiles, ongoing projects, and contact them directly through the platform.

dataPrivacy.question: How is my organization's data protected?
dataPrivacy.answer: We take data privacy seriously. Our platform uses advanced security measures including Row Level Security (RLS) policies, secure authentication, encrypted data transmission, and regular security audits. You control what information is public and what remains private to your organization.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Our platform supports three languages: English, French, and Spanish. You can switch between languages at any time, and all content including navigation, forms, and help text is available in your preferred language.

technicalSupport.question: What if I need help using the platform?
technicalSupport.answer: We provide comprehensive support through multiple channels: detailed user guides and tutorials, email support for technical issues, community forum for peer assistance, and regular webinars for platform training. Our support team is committed to helping you succeed.

contentModeration.question: How is content moderated on the platform?
contentModeration.answer: All content is moderated by our admin team to ensure quality and relevance. We have community guidelines that promote respectful dialogue, accurate information sharing, and constructive collaboration. Users can also report inappropriate content for review.
